text: Francis Megahy (18 March 1935 – 1 May 2020) was a British film director. ==Filmography== *Freelance (1971) *The Great Riviera Bank Robbery (1979) *Flashpoint Africa (1980) *Real Life (1984) *Taffin (1988) ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:People from Manchester Category:Deaths from cancer in California Category:British expatriates in the United States Category:British film directors
title: Francis Megahy
